knimeNode.name: FileLoader
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node loads one or two input file(s) and serves as a starting point for any NGS workflow.

fullDescription.intro: The FileLoader loads one or two input files and serves as a starting point for any NGS workflow.
fullDescription.option: Choose an input file in BAM/SAM, fastQ, VCF or BED format. A list of files (as .csv, .tsv or .list) with one file path per line can also be loaded. In this way several fastQ files of paired-end read experiments can be loaded. Pairs of fastQ files should be in the same row, but different columns, separated by tabs, white-spaces or commas.
In the case of paired end reads, a second fastQ file can be loaded.

ports.outPort:
Cell 0: The loaded file
Cell 1 (optional): The second fastQ file (if existing)
